AB: A minireview of some questions raised in experimental studies of memory. The problems of the functional significance of long-term potentiation, the hippocampus as a cognitive map, selective attention and the neuronal theta rhythm in the hippocampus and others are discussed on the basis of O.S. Vinogradova's works.
AD: Institute of Theoretical and Experimental Biophysics, Russian Academy of Sciences, Pushchino. arkhipov@iteb.ru
TT: Diskussionnye voprosy v sopremennykh issledovaniiakh mekhanizmov pamiati.
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 2004 Jan-Feb;54(1):5-10.
